subject: Hello to all
msgSnippet: Hello to all! I am glad to see a group like this and I hope to have many good conversations with all of you. I am an American living in the beautiful country

Hello to all! I am glad to see a group like this and I hope to have 
many g=
ood conversations with all of you. I am an American living in the 
beautifu=
l country side of Kanaya Japan. I am a member of several 
historical groups=
 which seek to protect and restore old houses as well 
as educate young Jap=
anese in the values of thier heritage. I am in no 
way and expert but if th=
ere is any questions on life during the Azuchi 
momoyama or Edo periods I w=
ould be happy to research them for you. 
Periodically I sell small Japanese=
 antiques and frequent many flea 
markets and antique shops so I don`t mind=
 looking for some particular 
item for you as long as you`re willing to pay=
 the shipping cost which 
can be quite expensive. Anyway again, I`m glad to=
 meet you all.

Robert Hirai
